title: D-Orbit raises $124 million in first tranche of Series D funding
key_assets: ['ION Satellite Carrier', 'orbital logistics infrastructure', 'General Expansion Architecture']
summary: D-Orbit has secured $128 million in the first tranche of its Series D funding round, led by Azimut Group. The investment includes $53 million in new funding and a $75 million buyout of an existing investor. The funds will be used for strategic acquisitions, expanding orbital logistics infrastructure, and scaling industrial capacity.
why_it_matters: This investment strengthens D-Orbit's position in the space logistics sector, enabling expansion into new markets, development of new spacecraft, and consolidation of leadership in space infrastructure. It also supports D-Orbit's long-term goal of creating an interplanetary logistics infrastructure.
